product_name: Horny Toad Clayton Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: The Horny Toad Clayton corduroy pants are made with a soft blend of cotton and polyester, plus a touch of stretchy spandex for great range of motion on your daily adventures. Includes a zippered fly with button closure; standard five-pocket design.
short_description: The Horny Toad Clayton corduroy pants are made with a soft blend of cotton and polyester, plus a touch of stretchy spandex for great range of motion on your daily adventures.
